```{r benchmarks_setup, message = FALSE}
library("targets")
library("mlr3viz")
library("viridis")
library("ggplot2")
tar_load(bmrk_results)
```

# Overview

```{r benchmarks_plot_c_harrell}
autoplot(bmrk_results) +
    geom_boxplot(aes(fill = learner_id)) +
    geom_jitter(position = position_jitter(0.2)) +
    scale_fill_viridis(discrete = TRUE) +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1, vjust = 0.5))
```

# Aggregated performance

```{r benchmarks_aggr_plot_c_harrell}
autoplot(bmrk_aggr, type = "box", meas = "harrell_c") +
    geom_boxplot(aes(fill = learner_id)) +
    geom_jitter(position = position_jitter(0.2)) +
    scale_fill_viridis(discrete = TRUE) +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1, vjust = 0.5))
```

# Critical difference

```{r benchmarks_aggr_critdiff_c_harrell}
autoplot(
    bmrk_aggr, type = "cd", meas = "harrell_c", minimize = FALSE, style = 2,
    p.value = 0.1
) + scale_color_viridis(discrete = TRUE)
```
